meanings.definition: A person or thing that magnetizes.
meanings.sent1: The magnetizer helped make the metal attract other objects.
meanings.sent2: The magnetizer was used to make the compass point north.
meanings.sent3: The magnetizer accidentally made all the paperclips stick together!
meanings.sent4: She was a magnetizer, drawing people to her with her warm smile.
meanings.sent5: The magnetizer in the science lab was a powerful tool for experiments.

meanings.definition: A device or substance that magnetizes.
meanings.sent1: The new magnetizer was able to make the metal pieces attract each other.
meanings.sent2: The magnetizer was carefully used to create magnetic fields.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played with the magnetizer, causing chaos in the room.
meanings.sent4: The magnetizer transformed the ordinary metal into a powerful magnet.
meanings.sent5: The magnetizer in the factory was essential for producing magnetic products.
